basic.blooming: Succulent plants, sometimes flowers with a short period time，花白色
basic.color: Leaf color blue white，and will turn red with adequate sunlight

maintenance.soil: Peat and akadama mixed in 3:1 ratio
maintenance.sunlight: Half shade in summer dormancy, other seasons need enough sunlight
maintenance.watering: Likes wet environments, water thoroughly when soil is dry, avoid saturated water
maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions, apply once monthly in spring and autumn
maintenance.pruning: Remove old, diseased and dead leaves timely
